comment.text: Restore all button text: "Restore all" is used as a label on a restore all button in the empty trash dialog, prompting users to retrieve deleted files. It appears on the screen when an empty trash dialog is opened. Translators should consider the context of file management and restoration.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Վերականգնել բոլորը' is a literal translation of 'Restore all', it might sound awkward or unnatural in Armenian. A more idiomatic translation might be preferable depending on the context.  'Վերականգնել ամեն ինչ' or 'Վերականգնել ամբողջը' could be better alternatives.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Վերականգնել ամեն ինչ' or 'Վերականգնել ամբողջը' for a more natural-sounding translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: '전부 복구' while acceptable, doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of 'Restore all'. '전체 복구' would be a more precise translation, emphasizing the restoration of everything.

The translation 'සියල්ල ප්‍රත්‍යර්පණය' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Restore all'. 'ප්‍රත්‍යර්පණය' implies a more technical or formal restoration process. A more common and understandable translation would be something along the lines of 'සියල්ල නැවත ගෙන එන්න' or 'සියල්ල යථා තත්वात පණිවිඩන්න'.

The translation "Поврати све" while literally meaning 'return all,' doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Restore all' in a technical context. 'Restore' implies a process of bringing something back to a previous state. A more appropriate translation would convey that meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Возврати све", “Рестауруј све”, or “Поврати све фајлове” (Restore all files) depending on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Her şeyi eski haline getir" is understandable, it's a slightly verbose and not the most natural translation of "Restore all".  A more direct and common translation would be "Her Şeyi Geri Yükle".
